topics.body:
All this talk about manga and such what do you think is going to be the next big thing?  I don't mean as in top dog, but I mean as in the general populace going apeshit over.

I know one piece is the most popular manga right now and that boku no hero academia is number 2, but rather what I mean is that how say dragonballz was all over the fucking place.  Boku no hero academia and one piece are popular *BUT* they don't have the butt-ton (strangely enough a butt ton is a metric unit of measurement)  What do you think might become the new big thing to reach that level of popularity in the future?

Basically what do you think will be the next thing to reach the level of say dragonballz popularity wise?

Side note: please don't go "it's going to be my favorite manga cause logically my favorite manga is the most liked manga and therefore everyone likes it!"  I mean this as objectively which manga or anime do you think will become the new big thing to reach that level of popularity to the point that everyone is watching it; completely excluding the fact of whether or not you're a fan of it and why do you think it will be that popular.
topics.author: 38b55cdf63616403d7560600
